about_the_game:
Mayday is an atmospheric 2D side-scroller sci-fi with simplistic gameplay. You control an ARK, awakened by a distress call from a nearby colony on Titan. Fly deep underground, rescuing the colonists while fighting dangerous entities spawning from the Titan Exawatt Muon Collider. Destroy the collider and prevent the singularity from forming to become the Hero of the Solar System.

The game is a one-man passion project, inspired by a game called Killer Watt on the Commodore 64, but grown into its own world in the process.

Gamepad controls are advised (which activate instantly when a gamepad connects, otherwise keyboard controls are active).

Exploration, action, and science-fiction in a straight-to-the point no frills indie package.
